subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On a night when the Mets received an unexpectedly poor outing by Tom Glavine and played without their regular leadoff, cleanup and No. 6 hitters, Lastings Milledge supplied a run-scoring triple and two-run homer, sending the Mets to a victory.
snippet: On a night when the Mets received an unexpectedly poor outing by Tom Glavine and played without their regular leadoff, cleanup and No. 6 hitters, Lastings Milledge supplied a run-scoring triple and two-run homer, sending the Mets to a victory.
